verbose_text: Our results revealed that TGF-beta1 upregulated the expression of HAS2 and HAS3, which increased the expression of CD44, and subsequently promoted CD44 / EGFR co-localization, and activated the downstream AKT and ERK pathways.
evidence: HAS3, which increased the expression of CD44, and subsequently promoted CD44/EGFR co-localization, and activated the downstream AKT and ERK
